title: Understanding Wikipedia's Role
text: Wikipedia is a starting point for research, not the final destination. It provides a broad overview of topics.

title: Identifying Keywords
text: Use Wikipedia to find key terms and concepts that you can explore in more depth using other sources.

hintAnswer: It can help you identify keywords and concepts to research elsewhere.
title: Choosing the Right Answer
text: Which of the following best describes how Wikipedia can assist in college research?
choices: It can be referred to for unbiased information on any topic.
It can help you identify keywords and concepts to research elsewhere.
It can be used as a sole source since it's so comprehensive.
It can be used as primary source material.
